name: Steamed Hams - An Unforgettable Luncheon
description:
Steamed Hams is an adaptation of the 22 Short Films About Springfield skit of the same name; this adapataion was made as part of a game jam, where the goal was to learn Ren'Py and create an experience in 8 hours.

This experience needed to incorporate the genre of visual novel and theme of sacrfices must be made. This project was completed in the scope of 8 hours, enjoy.
